item.title: Binary Classification Using Logistic Regression
item.description: -- Classification Classification refers to the process of categorizing objects into groups. Binary classification is a type of classification where objects are categorized into two groups. The most popular algorithms to perform binary classification are: Logistic Regression Support Vector Machines Decision Trees Random Forests Naive Bayes K-Nearest Neighbors How does machine learning work?
